publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4938 Iain Smith: Congratulations to Falkland and St Andrews—That the Parliament congratulates Falkland for being named Champion of Champions in the 2009 Royal Horticultural Society Britain in Bloom Awards, an accolade received in recognition of Falkland’s outstanding record of success over the years and its high-achieving approach to environmental issues; further congratulates St Andrews for achieving a silver award in the large coastal town category and an RHS Britain in Bloom Environmental Quality Award, and recognises that these successes have been achieved through the hard work of many committed volunteers in these communities. Supported by: Des McNulty*, Jamie McGrigor*, Jim Tolson*, Robin Harper*, Bob Doris*, Ross Finnie*
S3M-4938 Congratulations to Falkland and St Andrews (lodged on 25 September 2009) Jackie Baillie*, Mike Pringle*
S3M-4938 Congratulations to Falkland and St Andrews (lodged on 25 September 2009) Ted Brocklebank*
S3M-4938 Congratulations to Falkland and St Andrews (lodged on 25 September 2009) Gil Paterson*
